11  package de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies;
12  
13  import java.util.Collection;
14  import java.util.Objects;
15  import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
16  import java.util.logging.Level;
17  import java.util.logging.Logger;
18  import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
19  
20  import javax.swing.text.Document;
21  import javax.swing.text.StyledDocument;
22  
23  import org.openide.util.Exceptions;
24  import org.openide.util.Lookup;
25  
26  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.exceptions.FileTypeNotSupportedException;
27  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.strategies.netbeans.NetBeansFormatterStrategy;
28  import de.funfried.netbeans.plugins.external.formatter.ui.options.Settings;
29  
30  /**
31   * Delegation class for calling the activated external formatter or the internal
32   * NetBeans formatter if the external formatters are deactivated.
33   *
34   * @author markiewb
35   * @author bahlef
36   */
37  public class FormatterStrategyDispatcher {
38  	private static final Logger log = Logger.getLogger(FormatterStrategyDispatcher.class.getName());
39  
40  	private final NetBeansFormatterStrategystrategies/netbeans/NetBeansFormatterStrategy.html#NetBeansFormatterStrategy">NetBeansFormatterStrategy netbeansStrategy = new NetBeansFormatterStrategy();
41  
42  	private static final ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
43  
44  	private static FormatterStrategyDispatcher instance = null;
45  
46  	private FormatterStrategyDispatcher() {
47  	}
48  
49  	/**
50  	 * Returns the singleton instance of {@link FormatterStrategyDispatcher}.
51  	 *
52  	 * @return the singleton instance
53  	 */
54  	public static FormatterStrategyDispatcher getInstance() {
55  		lock.lock();
56  
57  		try {
58  			if (instance == null) {
59  				instance = new FormatterStrategyDispatcher();
60  			}
61  		} finally {
62  			lock.unlock();
63  		}
64  
65  		return instance;
66  	}
67  
68  	/**
69  	 * Formats the {@link StyledDocument} given in the {@link FormatterAdvice} in regard to
70  	 * the values included in that {@link FormatterAdvice}.
71  	 *
72  	 * @param fa the {@link FormatterAdvice} containing detailed instruction on what to format
73  	 */
74  	public void format(FormatterAdvice fa) {
75  		try {
76  			final StyledDocument styledDoc = fa.getStyledDocument();
77  
78  			IFormatterStrategyService formatterStrategyService = getActiveFormatterStrategyService(styledDoc);
79  			if (formatterStrategyService != null && formatterStrategyService.canHandle(styledDoc)) {
80  				try {
81  					formatterStrategyService.format(fa);
82  				} catch (FileTypeNotSupportedException ex) {
83  					log.log(Level.FINE, "Could not use " + formatterStrategyService.getDisplayName() + " for given document", ex);
84  
85  					// fallback to NetBeans formatter, but should never happen because of canHandle call before
86  					netbeansStrategy.format(fa);
87  				}
88  			} else {
89  				netbeansStrategy.format(fa);
90  			}
91  		} catch (Exception e) {
92  			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
93  		}
94  	}
95  
96  	/**
97  	 * Returns the continuation indent size configured by the formatter which is
98  	 * activated for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal
99  	 * NetBeans code formatter is used for the given {@code document}.
100 	 * 
101 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the continuation indent size
102 	 *                 is requested
103 	 *
104 	 * @return the continuation indent size configured by the formatter which is
105 	 *         activated for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the
106 	 *         internal NetBeans code formatter is used for the given {@code document}
107 	 */
108 	public Integer getContinuationIndentSize(Document document) {
109 		try {
110 			IFormatterStrategyService formatterStrategy = getActiveFormatterStrategyService(document);
111 			if (formatterStrategy != null && formatterStrategy.canHandle(document)) {
112 				formatterStrategy.getContinuationIndentSize(document);
113 			}
114 		} catch (Exception e) {
115 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
116 		}
117 
118 		return null;
119 	}
120 
121 	/**
122 	 * Returns the indent size configured by the formatter which is activated for
123 	 * the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal NetBeans code
124 	 * formatter is used for the given {@code document}.
125 	 * 
126 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the indent size is requested
127 	 *
128 	 * @return the indent size configured by the formatter which is activated for
129 	 *         the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal NetBeans
130 	 *         code formatter is used for the given {@code document}
131 	 */
132 	public Integer getIndentSize(Document document) {
133 		try {
134 			IFormatterStrategyService formatterStrategy = getActiveFormatterStrategyService(document);
135 			if (formatterStrategy != null && formatterStrategy.canHandle(document)) {
136 				formatterStrategy.getIndentSize(document);
137 			}
138 		} catch (Exception e) {
139 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
140 		}
141 
142 		return null;
143 	}
144 
145 	/**
146 	 * Returns the right margin (position of the red line in the editor) configured
147 	 * by the formatter which is activated for the given {@link Document}, or
148 	 * {@code null} if the internal NetBeans code formatter is used for the given
149 	 * {@code document}.
150 	 * 
151 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the right margin is requested
152 	 *
153 	 * @return the right margin (position of the red line in the editor) configured
154 	 *         by the formatter which is activated for the given {@link Document},
155 	 *         or {@code null} if the internal NetBeans code formatter is used for
156 	 *         the given {@code document}
157 	 */
158 	public Integer getRightMargin(Document document) {
159 		try {
160 			IFormatterStrategyService formatterStrategy = getActiveFormatterStrategyService(document);
161 			if (formatterStrategy != null && formatterStrategy.canHandle(document)) {
162 				formatterStrategy.getRightMargin(document);
163 			}
164 		} catch (Exception e) {
165 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
166 		}
167 
168 		return null;
169 	}
170 
171 	/**
172 	 * Returns the spaces per tab configured by the formatter which is activated
173 	 * for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal NetBeans
174 	 * code formatter is used for the given {@code document}.
175 	 * 
176 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the spaces per tab is requested
177 	 *
178 	 * @return the spaces per tab configured by the formatter which is activated
179 	 *         for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal
180 	 *         NetBeans code formatter is used for the given {@code document}
181 	 */
182 	public Integer getSpacesPerTab(Document document) {
183 		try {
184 			IFormatterStrategyService formatterStrategy = getActiveFormatterStrategyService(document);
185 			if (formatterStrategy != null && formatterStrategy.canHandle(document)) {
186 				formatterStrategy.getSpacesPerTab(document);
187 			}
188 		} catch (Exception e) {
189 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
190 		}
191 
192 		return null;
193 	}
194 
195 	private IFormatterStrategyService getActiveFormatterStrategyService(Document document) {
196 		Preferences prefs = Settings.getActivePreferences(document);
197 		String activeFormatterStrategyId = prefs.get(Settings.ENABLED_FORMATTER, NetBeansFormatterStrategy.ID);
198 
199 		Collection<? extends IFormatterStrategyService> formatterStrategyServices = Lookup.getDefault().lookupAll(IFormatterStrategyService.class);
200 		for (IFormatterStrategyService formatterStrategyService : formatterStrategyServices) {
201 			if (Objects.equals(activeFormatterStrategyId, formatterStrategyService.getId())) {
202 				return formatterStrategyService;
203 			}
204 		}
205 
206 		return null;
207 	}
208 
209 	/**
210 	 * Returns the expand tab to spaces flag configured by the formatter which is
211 	 * activated for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the internal
212 	 * NetBeans code formatter is used for the given {@code document}.
213 	 * 
214 	 * @param document the {@link Document} for which the expand tab to spaces flag is requested
215 	 *
216 	 * @return the expand tab to spaces flag configured by the formatter which is
217 	 *         activated for the given {@link Document}, or {@code null} if the
218 	 *         internal NetBeans code formatter is used for the given
219 	 *         {@code document}
220 	 */
221 	public Boolean isExpandTabToSpaces(Document document) {
222 		try {
223 			IFormatterStrategyService formatterStrategy = getActiveFormatterStrategyService(document);
224 			if (formatterStrategy != null && formatterStrategy.canHandle(document)) {
225 				formatterStrategy.isExpandTabToSpaces(document);
226 			}
227 		} catch (Exception e) {
228 			Exceptions.printStackTrace(e);
229 		}
230 
231 		return null;
232 	}
233 }
